snippet: The action against Matthew Rosenberg was the first public expulsion of an American journalist from Afghanistan since the rule of the Taliban.
abstract: Attorney general of Afghanistan orders expulsion of Matthew Rosenberg, American correspondent for The New York Times, and bars him from re-entering country; action is related to article written by Rosenberg that stated high-ranking officials were discussing forming interim government as possible resolution to country's electoral crisis--action that would effectively amount to a coup.
lead_paragraph: The action against Matthew Rosenberg was the first public expulsion of an American journalist from Afghanistan since the rule of the Taliban.

headline.main: Calling Article ‘Divisive,’ Afghanistan Orders Expulsion of Times Correspondent
headline.print_headline: Calling Article ‘Divisive,’ Afghanistan Orders Expulsion of Times Correspondent
